div.p: SCAM Development Platform is intended to be used as a basis for building repositories for the Semantic Web. The idea is that SCAM provides a stable and scalable solution that is capable of storing RDF data in a relational databases without demanding a lot of programming. SCAM hides the complexity of Semantic Web technology, and provides a highly adaptable and flexible out-of-the box solution for developing Semantic Web repositories with a minimum of development efforts and resources. SCAM can also be integrated or even embedded into other systems that are in need of advanced RDF functionality.
For more info, visit SCAM project site.
